titleStmt.title: To the honourable the House of Commons assembled in Parliament. The humble petition of many thousand poore people, in and about the citie of London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Will. Larner and T.B. this 31 of Ianuary, 1642. For the use of the petitioners who are to meet this present day in More Fields, and from thence to go to the house of Parliament with it in their hands,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "1641"; the 2 in "1642" has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
